'''11w50a''' (mislabeled as '''11w49a''' in-game) is the fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.1]], released on December 15, 2011,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2011/12/minecraft-dev-snapshot-week-50/|title=Minecraft Dev Snapshot Week 50|website=Mojang.com|date=December 15, 2011}}</ref> which adds new [[splash]]es and makes more [[music disc]]s obtainable in Survival, more specifically dropped by [[creeper]]s. This is the final snapshot released in 2011.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]'''
* Added 15 new splash texts.
** "日本ハロー！"
*** Means "Hello, Japan!"
*** This and the next five splashes have been added because the previous snapshot added support for multiple languages.
** "한국 안녕하세요!"
*** Means "Hello, Korea!"
** "Helo Cymru!"
*** Means "Hello, Wales!"
** "Cześć Polska!"
*** Means "Hello, Poland!"
*** In [[Java Edition 1.3.2|1.3.2 Pre-release]] this splash was changed to "Cześć Polsko!".
*** In [[Legacy Console Edition]] this splash still reads as "Cześć Polska!"
** "你好中国！"
*** Means "Hello, China!"
** "Γεια σου Ελλάδα!"
*** Means "Hello, Greece!"
** "My life for Aiur!"
** "Lennart lennart = new Lennart();"
** "I see your vocabulary has improved!"
** "You can't explain that!"
** "if not ok then return end"
** "<span style="color:#00A">C</span><span style="color:#0A0">o</span><span style="color:#0AA">l</span><span style="color:#A00">o</span><span style="color:#A0A">r</span><span style="color:#FA0">m</span><span style="color:#AAA">a</span><span style="color:#555">t</span><span style="color:#55F">i</span><span style="color:#5F5">c</span>‌"
** "FUNKY LOL"
*** This splash is obfuscated.
** "SOPA means LOSER in Swedish"
*** In 1.3 an exclamation point was added at the end of this splash.
*** This splash was removed in [[Java Edition 15w42a|15w42a]] ([[Java Edition 1.9|1.9]]).

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Music Disc blocks JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc chirp JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc far JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc mall JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc mellohi JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc stal JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc strad JE1 BE1.png;Music Disc ward JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Music Disc]]s'''
* The music discs "[[Music Disc blocks|blocks]]", "[[chirp]]", "[[Music Disc far|far]]", "[[mall]]", "[[mellohi]]", "[[stal]]", "[[strad]]", and "[[ward]]" can now be obtained when a [[skeleton]] kills a [[creeper]].

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Baby White Sheep JE1 BE4.png|32px]] [[Baby Sheep]]'''
* Baby sheep now eat faster.

=== General ===
'''Debug features'''
* Pressing {{Key|B}} no longer changes the [[player]]'s gamemode.</onlyinclude>
